2023-03-08.message: put the white plate on the purple circle
2023-03-08.label: put_obj_in_rcp

2023-03-08.message: put the orange cup on the blue square
2023-03-08.label: put_obj_in_rcp

2023-03-08.message: position the brown bowl, such that it appears upon the orange square mat.
2023-03-08.label: put_obj_in_rcp

2023-03-08.message: place the pan atop the green circular receptacle
2023-03-08.label: put_obj_in_rcp

2023-03-08.message: and to conclude, we shall plop the slice bread onto the yellow circle.
2023-03-08.label: put_obj_in_rcp

2023-03-08.message: have you operated on all of your objects?
2023-03-08.label: any_unused_objRcp

2023-03-08.message: excellent, we shall conclude this session
2023-03-08.label: goodbye
